rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frbr:realization (SKG-IF labels: manifestations)
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Work
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * fabio:Expression

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:hasDistributionDate (SKG-IF labels: distribution)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date on which something is distributed, for example the date on which a preprint of a document is e-mailed to colleagues and other academics by the author(s), or the date on which a printed announcement of forthcoming theatre events is mailed to those those on the theatre's mailing list.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcterms:valid (SKG-IF labels: validity)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Date of validity of a resource.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frbr:supplement (SKG-IF labels: is_supplemented_by)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Research products identifiers that are supplement of a given Research product.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Work
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * fabio:Work

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcat:accessService (SKG-IF labels: hosting_data_source)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Data source identifier for the manifestation.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * dcat:DataService

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: bido:holdsBibliometricDataInTime (SKG-IF labels: topics)
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Work
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * bido:BibliometricDataInTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:hasCorrectionDate (SKG-IF labels: correction)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date on which something, for example a document, is corrected.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frbr:embodiment (SKG-IF labels: pages)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: the pages where the manifestation in defined (within its Venue).
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * fabio:Manifestation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: prism:startingPage (SKG-IF labels: first)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The starting page.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Manifestation
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:string

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:hasAccessDate (SKG-IF labels: access)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date on which a particular digital item, such as a PDF or an HTML file, has been accessed by somebody.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: datacite:hasIdentifier (SKG-IF labels: identifiers)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Objects representing external identifiers for the manifestation.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression * fabio:Work
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * datacite:Identifier

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: prov:wasAssociatedWith (SKG-IF labels: associated_with)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: the `local_identifier` of the Agent responsible for the topic relation.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * prov:Activity
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * foaf:Agent

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pro:isHeldBy (SKG-IF labels: by)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The identifier of an Agent contributing to a Research product.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * pro:RoleInTime * scoro:ContributionSituation
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * foaf:Agent

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pso:StatusInTime
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* dcterms:description -[0..1]-> xsd:string * pso:withStatus -[1]-> pso:PublicationStatus

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: cito:isDocumentedBy (SKG-IF labels: is_documented_by)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Research products identifiers that documents a given Research product.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Work
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * fabio:Work

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcterms:dateAccepted (SKG-IF labels: acceptance)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date of acceptance of an entity. Examples of entities to which a date accepted may be relevant are a thesis (accepted by a university examination board) or an article (accepted by a journal editor).
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: prism:versionIdentifier (SKG-IF labels: version)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The version for a software or research data product.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:string

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: co:index (SKG-IF labels: rank)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The rank (i.e., order of appearance) of a Agent with a specific role (e.g., the order of an author in a list) of a Research product.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * pro:RoleInTime * scoro:ContributionSituation
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:positiveInteger

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frbr:revisionOf (SKG-IF labels: is_new_version_of)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Research products identifiers that are prior versions of a given Research product.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Work
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * fabio:Work

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:hasDepositDate (SKG-IF labels: deposit)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date on which an entity has been deposited, for example in a library, repository, supplementary information archive, database or similar place of document or information storage.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: skos:inScheme (SKG-IF labels: defined_in)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: the URL of the schema of the manifestation type, e.g., a link to the vocabulary of allowed product types.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * skos:Concept
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * skos:ConceptScheme

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcterms:created (SKG-IF labels: creation)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date on which an entity has been created.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: scoro:withContribution (SKG-IF labels: contribution_types)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The contributions that an Agent had in a Research product.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * pro:RoleInTime * scoro:ContributionSituation
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * scoro:Contribution

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:hasDateCollected (SKG-IF labels: collected)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date on which some item has been collected, for example the data gathered by means of questionnaires.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pso:holdsStatusInTime (SKG-IF labels: )
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * pso:StatusInTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: bido:withBibliometricData (SKG-IF labels: term)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The identifier of a Topic relevant for the Research product.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * bido:BibliometricDataInTime
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * fabio:SubjectTerm

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:hasRequestDate (SKG-IF labels: request)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date on which an agent is requested to do something, for example a reviewer is requested to write a review of a paper submitted to a journal for publication, or an author is requested to supply a revised version of the paper in response to the reviews received.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:hasSequenceIdentifier (SKG-IF labels: number)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: a number of the manifestation within the Venue (e.g., chapter number).
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:string

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:hasDecisionDate (SKG-IF labels: decision)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date on which a particular endeavour, such as a grant application, has been or will be approved or rejected by somebody.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcterms:abstract (SKG-IF labels: abstracts)
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Work
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: SKG-O: research-product
rdf:Description.dc:title: The SKG-IF Ontology: research-product
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Scientific Knowledge Graphs â€“ Interoperability Framework (SKG-IF) WG
rdf:Description.dc:rights: This work is distributed under a Creative Commons Attribution License (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/legalcode)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: SKG-O, the SKG-IF Ontology, is not yet another bibliographic ontology. Rather it is just a place where existing and complementary ontological entities from several other ontologies, all employed in the Scientific Knowledge Graph Interoperability Framework (SKG-IF), are grouped together for the purpose of providing descriptive metadata compliant with the SKG-IF Data Model.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: scoro:ContributionSituation
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* co:index -[0..1]-> xsd:positiveInteger * pro:isHeldBy -[1]-> foaf:Agent * pro:relatesToOrganization -[0..N]-> foaf:Organization * pro:withRole -[0..1]-> pro:Role * scoro:withContribution -[0..N]-> scoro:Contribution

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: skos:Concept
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* skos:inScheme -[0..1]-> skos:ConceptScheme * skos:prefLabel -[0..N]-> rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: prov:wasGeneratedBy (SKG-IF labels: provenance)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Provenance information tracking the origin of the relation between a Topic and a Research product.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * bido:BibliometricDataInTime
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * prov:Activity

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: prism:volume (SKG-IF labels: volume)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Volume number (for journals, books, conferences).
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:string

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pro:relatesToOrganization (SKG-IF labels: declared_affiliations)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Organisations identifiers that reflect the declared affiliations of a Agent for a Research product.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * pro:RoleInTime * scoro:ContributionSituation
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * foaf:Organization

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: cito:cites (SKG-IF labels: cites)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Research products identifiers that are cited by a given Research product.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Work
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * fabio:Work

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:hasRetractionDate (SKG-IF labels: retraction)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date on which something, for example a claim or a journal article, is retracted.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: bido:BibliometricDataInTime
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* bido:withBibliometricData -[1]-> fabio:SubjectTerm * prov:wasGeneratedBy -[0..N]-> prov:Activity

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:hasDateReceived (SKG-IF labels: received)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date on which some item is received, for example a document being received by a publisher.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcterms:title (SKG-IF labels: titles)
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Work
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcterms:relation (SKG-IF labels: relevant_organisations)
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Work
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * foaf:Organization

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcterms:issued (SKG-IF labels: publication)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date of formal issuance of a resource (e.g. a publication or a patent).
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pro:RoleInTime
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* co:index -[0..1]-> xsd:positiveInteger * pro:isHeldBy -[1]-> foaf:Agent * pro:relatesToOrganization -[0..N]-> foaf:Organization * pro:withRole -[0..1]-> pro:Role * scoro:withContribution -[0..N]-> scoro:Contribution

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frapo:isFundedBy (SKG-IF labels: funding)
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Work
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * frapo:Grant

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcterms:dateCopyrighted (SKG-IF labels: copyright)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date on which an entity has been copyrighted.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frbr:partOf (SKG-IF labels: in, is_part_of)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Venue identifier for the manifestation.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression * fabio:Work
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * fabio:Expression * fabio:Work

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: datacite:Identifier
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* datacite:usesIdentifierScheme -[1]-> datacite:IdentifierScheme * literal:hasLiteralValue -[1]-> rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:Manifestation
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* prism:endingPage -[1]-> xsd:string * prism:startingPage -[1]-> xsd:string

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: prism:edition (SKG-IF labels: edition)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The edition (for journals and books).
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:string

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pro:isRelatedToRoleInTime (SKG-IF labels: contributions)
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Work
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * pro:RoleInTime * scoro:ContributionSituation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: prism:issueIdentifier (SKG-IF labels: issue)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Issue number.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:string

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:hasEmbargoDate (SKG-IF labels: embargo)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date before which an entity should not be published, or before which a press release should not be reported on. For open-access journal articles, the embargo date is the date before which availability of the open-access version of the article is restricted by the publisher, following subscription-access availability of the published work.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: literal:hasLiteralValue (SKG-IF labels: value)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The external identifier.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * datacite:Identifier
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: datacite:usesIdentifierScheme (SKG-IF labels: scheme)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The scheme for the external identifier (e.g., doi, handle, url, pubmed, etc.).
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * datacite:Identifier
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * datacite:IdentifierScheme

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pro:withRole (SKG-IF labels: role)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The role that an Agent had in a Research product, to choose among `author`, `editor`, and `publisher`.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * pro:RoleInTime * scoro:ContributionSituation
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * pro:Role

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pso:withStatus (SKG-IF labels: status)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: describe if the manifestation is open access (`open`), closed access (`closed`), under embargo (`embargoed`), restricted access (`restricted`), or unavailable for some reason (`unavailable`).
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * pso:StatusInTime
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * pso:PublicationStatus

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:Work (SKG-IF labels: Research product)
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* bido:holdsBibliometricDataInTime -[0..N]-> bido:BibliometricDataInTime * cito:cites -[0..N]-> fabio:Work * cito:isDocumentedBy -[0..N]-> fabio:Work * datacite:hasIdentifier -[0..N]-> datacite:Identifier * dcterms:abstract -[0..N]-> rdfs:Literal * dcterms:relation -[0..N]-> foaf:Organization * dcterms:title -[0..N]-> rdfs:Literal * frapo:isFundedBy -[0..N]-> frapo:Grant * frbr:partOf -[0..N]-> fabio:Work * frbr:realization -[0..N]-> fabio:Expression * frbr:revisionOf -[0..N]-> fabio:Work * frbr:supplement -[0..N]-> fabio:Work * pro:isRelatedToRoleInTime -[0..N]-> pro:RoleInTime * pro:isRelatedToRoleInTime -[0..N]-> scoro:ContributionSituation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: prism:endingPage (SKG-IF labels: last)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The ending page.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Manifestation
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:string

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:Expression
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* datacite:hasIdentifier -[0..N]-> datacite:Identifier * dcat:accessService -[0..1]-> dcat:DataService * dcterms:created -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * dcterms:dateAccepted -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * dcterms:dateCopyrighted -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * dcterms:issued -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * dcterms:modified -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * dcterms:valid -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * fabio:hasAccessDate -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * fabio:hasCorrectionDate -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * fabio:hasDateCollected -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * fabio:hasDateReceived -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * fabio:hasDecisionDate -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * fabio:hasDepositDate -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * fabio:hasDistributionDate -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * fabio:hasEmbargoDate -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * fabio:hasRequestDate -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * fabio:hasRetractionDate -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * fabio:hasSequenceIdentifier -[0..1]-> xsd:string * frbr:embodiment -[0..1]-> fabio:Manifestation * frbr:partOf -[0..1]-> fabio:ExpressionCollection * prism:edition -[0..1]-> xsd:string * prism:issueIdentifier -[0..1]-> xsd:string * prism:versionIdentifier -[0..1]-> xsd:string * prism:volume -[0..1]-> xsd:string * pso:holdsStatusInTime -[0..N]-> pso:StatusInTime * rdf:type -[0..1]-> skos:Concept

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: prov:Activity
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* prov:wasAssociatedWith -[1]-> foaf:Agent * rdf:value -[1]-> xsd:float

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcterms:modified (SKG-IF labels: modified)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date on which an entity has been modified.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcterms:description (SKG-IF labels: description)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: describe and qualify the specific status selected.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * pso:StatusInTime
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:string

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: skos:prefLabel (SKG-IF labels: labels)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: the labels describing the type (multiple for multilingualism).
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * skos:Concept
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal
